title: IIHR Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Young Professional, Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Horticultural Research (IIHR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Young Professionals and Senior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc and M.Sc can apply for the IIHR Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age lim...
